Lyric:
[by:immaculatewhore]
[00:35.81]Robert's got a quick hand
[00:39.60]He'll look around the room, he won't tell you his plan
[00:42.77]He's got a rolled cigarette
[00:46.99]Hanging out his mouth, he's a cowboy kid
[00:49.98]Yeah, he found a six-shooter gun
[00:54.70]In his dad's closet, in the box of fun things
[00:58.30]I don't even know what
[01:01.61]But he's coming for you, yeah, he's coming for you
[01:05.32]
[01:05.53]All the other kids with the pumped up kicks
[01:08.84]You better run, better run, outrun my gun
[01:13.50]All the other kids with the pumped up kicks
[01:16.32]You better run, better run, faster than my bullet
[01:20.57]All the other kids with the pumped up kicks
[01:23.81]You better run, better run, outrun my gun
[01:28.40]All the other kids with the pumped up kicks
[01:31.28]You better run, better run, faster than my bullet
[01:35.22]
[01:35.74]Daddy works a long day
[01:39.16]He be coming home late, and he's coming home late
[01:42.71]And he's bringing me a surprise
[01:46.72]'Cause dinner's in the kitchen and it's packed in ice
[01:50.10]I've waited for a long time
[01:54.70]Yeah, the sleight of my hand is now a quick-pull trigger
[01:58.80]I reason with my cigarette
[02:01.49]Then say, "Your hair's on fire, you must've lost your wits, yeah?"
[02:05.13]

[02:35.28]

[02:38.40]Run, run, run â run, run, run
[02:42.13]Run, run, run â run, run, run
[02:45.86]Run, run â run, run
[02:48.48]Run, run, run, run, run!
